title: fun off meta supports?
body: been looking for something to freshen up my games, any suggestions?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=rewt127,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qBaY8VUi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-21T03:23:43.665+0000)
>
> {{champion:4}}

Or, how to be utterly useless while providing easy food for the jungler if your ult is down.
2 second targeted cc on a 5 second cooldown. its pretty gucci

{{champion:134}}  + {{champion:21}} 

I'll let you figure it out
Syndra is actually a p great support, particularly against Zyra since you can punt her plants around :D
{{champion:78}} support? grant it's mostly a counter measure i like using against a mobile adc or rakan. still it's funny to see them bounce off my w, or ulting their support out of the fight
Poppy also makes a great buddy for Vayne if she's good, since Condemn x2.

{{champion:133}} 
I have been playing it so much lately...
pretty much any time I have a team that is chill with it in champ select and team comps permit me to do it...

It is so ridiculously fun. You get a mini knock-up (great in yas comps), a slow, a blind that scales with ap and makes it super easy to finish a spellthief quest, VISION built into your kit, and crazy roaming ability post-6. You can get your adc super ahead bc of your great poke/peel with q & e, scare off the jungler or enemy support hiding in bushes with your w... be across the map in .2 seconds when you need to roam...

I really really love it.
Amumu duo with Kalista in kinda bloody at lvl 6.
